review: add naked skins
今天没冲出来，给个差评
只想说什么时候没

Despite 90% of the Mostly Negative reviews I am going to leave a positive one here.

People should move on already,yeah blizzard is a bad company nowadays and they did a lot of scummy things but it's getting tired to hear the same old reasons every single day, 
>"I miss the lootboxes" -Literally it's not their fault here,lootboxes are banned in a lot of countries because it's considered gambling (And even if they kept lootboxes, they would've made you pay for them just like in CS:GO, lootboxes would've not been free)
>"PVE sucks,they removed all the skills trees and everything nice and now it even costs money" -PVE really sucks indeed but I was one of the people who didn't care about PVE in a PVP game, I would've loved if they made a SP game or a multiple choice game like how telltale games are. And even IF the PVE come out as planned, it would've still have to buy it, nothing is free anymore in F2P games. Some games have weapon skins for over 30$
>"Dead game lul" -I am sure a lot of people still play this game.
>"Why skins are so expensive??" -It's a free to play game,this happens in every game not just Overwatch and sadly they are really expensive, but they still don't give you any advances in PVP (Plus you can get a ton of skins from Twitch or with the legacy credits)
>"They locked the new heroes in the battlepass" -Yeah,I agree this is really bad but at the same time they still give you a challenge after the season is over so you can unlock it and from what I've seen the challenges are not that hard to complete.
>"Play TF2" -I used to play it,not anymore thank u
>"You are kissing Blizzard ass" -No but I am tired of hearing the same old people complaining about these things, again I am only defending some aspects of the game and not the entire thing.

Overall, I feel this game is going to grow despite the bad things that blizzard does and I hope it becomes as good as it was back in 2016.
Leaving negative reviews won't change anything, I am sure they won't even notice it.
I wonder if in another timeline Overwatch 1 would've become even better having a single player/co-op game and PVE would've had a ton of updates and new maps.

Also nerf Illari,she's way too op.
是真的垃圾，垃圾暴雪，下个游戏就为了给你写差评，垃圾垃圾垃圾啊啊啊啊啊！！！！！

It's like the first game but worse in almost every way. Stepped away from the first game for a few years. Came back since this was on Steam. Also doesn't help that the new DLC character is broken as hell. Definitely to drive sales. Even Free, would not reccomend.

Com o lançamento da terceira temporada do OW2 começou um problema relacionado ao shader cache do jogo, fazendo com que o jogo tivesse que carregar os shaders do zero sempre que abrisse ele e te fazendo esperar 10~15 minutos antes de boa parte dos shaders carregarem e o desempenho geral estabilizar e os travamentos cessarem. Era algo tão incômodo que eu basicamente abandonei o jogo desde então. Mas, pra minha surpresa, estamos na sexta temporada, o jogo lançou na Steam e ainda assim esse problema continua no jogo, gerando travamentos e diversos sistemas independente das especificações...
